name: FingerThon
description:
HOW FAST ARE YOUR FINGERS?

A 2D Entertainment game, local multiplayer (2 Players), where if you want to win you will have to move your fingers faster than your opponent!. A game created in 1 week, by a single independent developer [Me].

In this game you will not have to worry about configuring the language you speak!. We have programmed that part very well so that the game detects what language you speak!

Translated to: [English] - [Spanish] - [Portuguese]

With a simple and interactive interface:

Activate and Deactivate the Volume. If you want, reset the game:
